thread.title: Priya Anand as heroine of GV Prakash kumar in a new Tamil film - Tamil Movie News
thread.title_full: Priya Anand as heroine of GV Prakash kumar in a new Tamil film - Tamil Movie News

title: Priya Anand as heroine of GV Prakash kumar in a new Tamil film - Tamil Movie News
text: The Defining Moments of the Jallikattu Protests in Tamil Nadu Young and talented actress Priya Anand's latest Malayalam release 'Ezra' is rewriting box office records. In Tamil she will be seen playing the female lead role of a village belle in 'Muthuramalingam', scheduled to hit the screens this week. This is her second film with Gautham Karthik after 'Vai Raja Vai' that released in May 2015. In her exclusive Red Carpet interview to IndiaGlitz, Priya Anand confirmed that she will be pairing up with leading young hero cum music director G.V.Prakash Kumar. "GV and I are supposed to be working on a film. GV is really busy doing lots of films. Once he is available, I think we will start." G.V.Prakash is currently shooting for 'Adangathey', '4G' and 'Ayngaran'. His 'Bruce Lee' is scheduled to hit the screens on March 3, 2017. We wish the best for G.V.Prakash and Priya Anand project and looking forward for this fresh combo.
